item.title: Recycle Video Games and Gaming Systems
item.description:
Think about all the video games and gaming systems you have in your home, even the ones tucked away. You probably have quite a collection! Wouldn’t it be great to turn those unused games and consoles into cash? Instead of letting them gather dust, you could use the money to buy whatever you want, including the newest games and systems. Selling your old gaming stuff can be a hassle, but it doesn’t have to be...

item.title: Earth Day Means Money For Electronics Recycling
item.description:
Today is Earth Day, a day to appreciate nature and consider our impact. We should treat our planet with respect or face the consequences. Speaking of which, why not make some money while being environmentally conscious? It’s entirely possible to earn money by responsibly discarding old electronics. Even someone very frugal would see the value in making a little cash while helping the environment. Wouldn’t you agree? How about making some easy money through recycling?..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/earth-day-means-money-for-electronics-recycling/

item.title: Where Wireless Device Are Free
item.description:
Mobile devices today are advancing at a similar rate to computers five to ten years ago. Remember constantly upgrading your desktop computer even though it still worked fine? The rapid software development quickly outpaced processor and memory capabilities. Large files from complex applications required additional storage drives. Today, computers have plateaued in their technological advancement, allowing us to fully utilize them before needing an upgrade. This applies particularly to laptops and notebooks, which often experience physical wear before their performance declines...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/where-wireless-device-are-free/

item.title: Get Cash For Your Used or Broken iPhone
item.description:
Your old iPhone may be worse for wear, but don’t throw it away! It’s still valuable. Discarding it wastes money and harms the environment when you can easily sell it for cash. Surprisingly, companies will buy your used iPhone regardless of its condition. Naturally, better condition means more money, but even damaged phones have value, ranging from a few dollars to over $100! A functional iPhone 4S can fetch over $100, far more than you’d get tossing it in the garbage...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/get-cash-for-your-used-or-broken-iphone/

item.title: Recycle Your BlackBerry Phone For Cash
item.description:
You can make money off your old BlackBerry phone instead of throwing it away. Even without a service plan, your old BlackBerry might be worth a significant amount of money depending on its model, age, and condition. Selling it yourself can be a hassle, but there’s an easier way. An electronics recycling company will pay cash for used BlackBerry phones and other cell phone models. To see if yours qualifies, visit their website and search for your BlackBerry model...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/recycle-your-blackberry-phone-for-cash/

item.title: Sell Your Old or Broken Laptop For Cash
item.description:
Do you have a pile of old laptops in your basement, even those with cracked screens that ended up in the trash? You might be surprised to learn that those old devices, broken or not, can actually earn you some money. It’s true! Most laptops aren’t as worthless as you might think. Throwing them away or sending them to a landfill is not the best approach. Those old circuit boards and components contain harmful materials that can pollute the environment over time...

item.title: Computer Recycling Easier Than Ever
item.description:
Most people own several computers at home, but many go unused due to outdated specifications. Instead of letting them gather dust, have you considered selling or recycling them for cash? Computer recycling is a relatively new concept. Previously, old computers were relegated to storage or landfills. However, there’s a growing concern about the environmental impact of discarded electronics. Many communities now organize recycling events, offering a responsible disposal method. But instead of giving away your old computers, you can sell them for profit...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/computer-recycling-easier-than-ever/

item.title: Greening The Product Life Cycle
item.description:
Products used to be designed, made, transported, sold, used, and discarded without much connection between those stages. However, we are transitioning to a time where each step in a product’s life will be synchronized and often designed to minimize environmental impact. The old saying “use it up, wear it out, make it do or do without” reflects a different mindset than the industrial age’s emphasis on planned obsolescence and disposability. As environmental concerns grow, we might be shifting back towards those earlier values of resourcefulness...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/greening-the-product-life-cycle/
